author: karlgandhi360
title: DAOForge Easily Create cardanoDOA's
description: Due to the complexities of Plutus(Cardano's scripting language) creating DOA's on Cardano is a difficult and technical process.
solution: DOAForge envisions to reduce the complexity of creating DOA's on Cardano by allowing users to use a web application in order to launch DAO's
experience:
Working in the Engineering team of a well known Cardano DEX.  
Formal university education in mathematics and computing.  
Web App experience.
